name: Gold Miner - HD - Classic Version
description:
Gold Miner is a most popular casual games.
This kind of game is very easy to play and it helps people relax.
It is not only very awesome,but it had given us more happpies time.
It becomes a classic game to everyone and can be played anywhere.
In this game you're a gold miner and your mission is to collect the gold nuggets by pressing the screen,
the same way you activate the sticks of dynamite which you can use when something else than gold will get in your hands.

This GoldMiner game comes with the following features:

- The most classic gold miner game.
- The most classic gold miner game.
- Games All use high-definition big picture, to bring you a new visual experience
- Gold Miner is very popular classic puzzle game
- Optimization of gameplay, adding three new skills, props, make games more fun
- Simple, hook swing in the process, aimed at gold, that would tap the screen when you release the hook to grab gold.
- Each game, each level of the map may be different, so every time a new challenge opens!
